short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utilize the full power of AI in your browser! Translate, summarize, rewrite any text in just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
TextCraft is a versatile Google Chrome extension designed to enhance your text processing experience. With TextCraft, you can effortlessly translate text into various languages, adjust the tone of voice to suit your needs, generate summaries of selected text with key highlights, and even rewrite your text in a condensed or literary style. Additionally, TextCraft offers grammar and punctuation error correction for polished writing.

Key Features:

Translate text into multiple languages.
Adjust the tone of voice to match your preferences.
Generate summaries of selected text with important highlights.
Rewrite text in a condensed or literary style.
Correct grammar and punctuation errors.
Language Support:
TextCraft supports multiple languages, ensuring a seamless experience for users worldwide.

Easy to Use:
Using TextCraft is simple and intuitive. Just select the text on the page, choose the desired action from the context menu, and let TextCraft do the rest.

Upgrade your text processing capabilities with TextCraft today!
